input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Leather Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Marine Star Automatic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Analog Watch Dial'
  - Name='Bulova Bulova 96A312 Lunar Pilot Meteorite Arch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Marine Star Dive Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Lord Automatic Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Signature Steel-Link Watch'
  - Name='Garmin Forerunner 55'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Jorn Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Sport Watch'
  - Name='CITIZEN Eco-Drive Dress/Classic Eco Rolan Mens Stainless Steel'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Chronograph White Dial Men's Watch AT8110-53E'
  - Name='CITIZEN Eco-Drive Sport Luxury PCAT Mens Stainless Steel'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Maryland Terrapins Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Men's Citizen AW5005 Military Nylon Strap Eco Drive Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's G-Shock Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Automatic Sports'
  - Name='Bulova 96B410 Orologio Uomo Al quarzo'
  - Name='98A146 Bulova Mens Watch'
  - Name='Men's Bulova Marine Star 96B433 Automatic'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Air Force Falcons Watch'
  - Name='98A302 Marine Star Bulova Men's Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Lunar Pilot'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Rhett Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Watches'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Fenmore Multifunction Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a men's analog watch with a leather strap and multifunction features; similar casual/dress style but likely lacks the titanium case and high water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Marine Star Automatic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic dive watch with sport features similar to Expedition's durability and water resistance; likely heavier due to automatic movement but similar outdoor/active use.
Analog watch by Casio, likely rugged and casual, but lacks specific features like titanium case or leather strap; probably more basic functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Bulova 96A312 Lunar Pilot Meteorite Arch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stylish and likely a specialty dial model; less focus on ruggedness or outdoor performance compared to Expedition titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Marine Star Dive Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport dive watch with good water resistance akin to the Expedition; similar use case though possibly less focused on lightweight titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Lord Automatic Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic chronograph likely focused on style and functionality but less on outdoor ruggedness or titanium case features.
Steel-link bracelet watch with minimalist design; stylistically different and less rugged than titanium outdoor watch.
Digital GPS running watch focused on fitness tracking, very different type of watch and construction compared to analog titanium field watch.
Minimalist, stylish analog watch with steel case and mesh strap; different use case and materials than rugged titanium Expedition.
Sport watch likely with durable features and possibly enhanced water resistance; similar active lifestyle appeal though material specifics unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CITIZEN Eco-Drive Dress/Classic Eco Rolan Mens Stainless Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic dress watch in stainless steel; less rugged and outdoor-focused than titanium Expedition but similar analog design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Chronograph White Dial Men's Watch AT8110-53E
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive analog chronograph with sport features; closer to functionality of Expedition but likely not titanium or same water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CITIZEN Eco-Drive Sport Luxury PCAT Mens Stainless Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport luxury watch with durable features and Eco-Drive system; aligns with active use though differs in materials with stainless steel vs titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Maryland Terrapins Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Theming and stainless steel construction suggest more casual wear than rugged, lightweight titanium adventure watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Citizen AW5005 Military Nylon Strap Eco Drive Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military-style Eco-Drive watch with nylon strap; closely aligned in function and style for outdoor use though different strap material and likely steel case.
Highly shock-resistant and water-resistant rugged analog-digital watch; shares durability and outdoor utility with Expedition titanium, though construction differs.
Automatic sport-oriented watch that likely includes durable features; aligns with outdoor active watch category but heavier movement.
Quartz movement aligns with Expedition, but less info on rugged features or materials lowers relevancy.
Analog quartz watch, likely casual or dress style; less emphasis on rugged durability or titanium case.
Automatic Marine Star dive watch offering water resistance and sport features; similar use to Expedition but heavier due to automatic movement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Air Force Falcons Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Themed watch with military association but likely more stylistic than rugged titanium build.
Marine Star dive watch with sport functionality, water resistance, and durability suitable for active use, akin to Expedition.
Specialty chronograph watch with historic space theme; less about ruggedness or outdoor toughness like the Expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Rhett Multifunction Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Multifunction analog watch with stainless steel; similar general style and function but not titanium or high water resistance.
Broad category with variable styles; cannot assume high relevancy without specific rugged or titanium features.
